title: Roommate Menage Fantasy
description: FREE bonus chapters included at the back of the book!Brian and Zack are not only college roommates but also great friends who share common interests – funny stories, parties, and women. However, Zack’s girlfriend, Lindsay has eyes for Brian and this puts a bit of a rift between the two pals. When Lindsay presents an offer Brian can’t refuse, Brian has a split second to decide if his friendship is worth endangering at the chance to be with a stunning brunette he’s only fantasized over.What happens when Brian is presented with such a tempting offer? Will Zack be upset over his girlfriend choosing his roommate over him? And, can the three have the best of everything by compromising?Due to some sexual content, 18+ only please.
author: Maria Lucy
